item.description:
The Four New People that we T*A*U*G*H*T beat up on all us oldies (but goodies).
Zele and Melody, newbies from two weeks ago (Zele and Melody) were a no show, but hopefully these new four will let us 'skunk' them back! Art, Ian, Denise and Mark!!! Karen was not a happy player because of these newbies ^_^

We are a F*U*N bunch of wonderful cribbage playing people who sometimes do get the yodeling pickle (which I again left in my car as was told to).....But really wanted to pickle those new people that skunked us.....

And, as usual, we closed the place up at 10 p.m., but not till we finished the coffe and CHOCOLATE CHIP cookies!!

COME ON DOWN !!

NOTE: Next MeetUp for Walthan Cribbage will be on Tuesday, APRIL 6 and then continue on from there for every other week till the end of the year!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Back Room with our Cribbage Boards at the READY!
item.name: Waltham Cribbage MeetUp: S*P*R*I*N*G is HERE ! !
